creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: back of head of African woman with hair in seven pigtails; partial views of back of heads of other people visible at bottom
image_copyright: © J.D. %27Okhai Ojeikere%2C Courtesy L. Parker Stephenson Photographs%2C NY
text:
J.D. ‘Okhai Ojeikere’s photographs from his Hairstyles series document Nigerian women’s hairstyles at work, in the street, or at more formal occasions. The series consists of more than 1000 photographs and is considered iconic by both the worlds of fashion photography and social documentary photography, for capturing both Nigerian femininity and vernacular culture.

‘Okhai Ojeikere’s photographs will be the first in the collection by the Nigerian photographer and as such mark an important expansion of our holdings of African photography.
title: Mkpuk Eba, HD694/74
